content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace array at position(0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace at position (0.0, 0.0) with 49 iron ore and 0 coal
- Furnace at position (2.0, 0.0) with 0 iron ore and 0 coal
- Furnace at position (4.0, 0.0) with 0 iron ore and 0 coal
- Furnace at position (6.0, 0.0) with 0 iron ore and 0 coal

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items into furnaces
- Ensure the furnace has available inventory space before attempting to insert items. The error indicates that the furnace at position (0, 0) is full, preventing the insertion of coal.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items. 

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing. 

### Repeated errors
- The error regarding the inability to insert coal into the furnace at position (0, 0) has occurred multiple times. Check the inventory of the furnace regularly to avoid this issue.
